<section class="bs-section bs-section-5302e22f53fe44d29685e2742994df0aa26fa04e bs-section---default bs-section--video-content  "><div class="container">
<div class="bs-row row  flex-md-row-reverse bs-row---default">
<div class=" bs-column col-sm-0 col-md-5   bs-column-569c1b1f301001dbac80671b52f79fed81378ff6 bs-column---default     ">
<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left">The Kentucky Derby is just the beginning…</h2>



<p class="has-text-align-left">It all started with an inaugural race meet in 1875 that featured two flagship horse races: the Kentucky Oaks and the Kentucky Derby. These iconic races are still run beneath the Twin Spires 150 years later, making the Derby the longest continually-held annual sporting event in the United States. Today, Derby Week is preceded by a month of events celebrating the Kentucky Derby and helps to bring over $400 million to the local economy each year.</p>



<p class="has-text-align-left">Headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, Churchill Downs Incorporated has expanded through the development of live and historical racing entertainment venues, the growth of the TwinSpires horse racing online wagering business and the operation and development of regional casino gaming properties. </p>
</div></div>
</div>



<div class=" bs-column col-sm-0 col-md-7   bs-column-359482647032a4b9ff3dc2acc26ae76505c58d33 bs-column---default     "><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default bs-media-element--video-observe enable">	<div class=" video-wrapper">

<section class="bs-section bs-section-404c65dce432da07f261ae4e495c5bad54b49dac bs-section---default bs-section--home-tab-container  "><div class="container">
<div class="bs-row row   bs-row---default">
<div class=" bs-column col-sm-12   bs-column-5f6574ebb29ac8d58ab608d2aff5b1bbe4f96332 bs-column---default     ">
<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center">About Churchill Downs Incorporated</h3>


<div id="accordion_1e1425f9edc7_container" class="bs-slider-accordion bs-slider-accordion---default " data-attributes="{"breakpoint":1200,"accordionIndex":1,"defaultOpenIndex":0,"accordionClassNames":[{"value":"bs-slider-accordion---default","label":"Default"}],"sliderEnabled":false,"slideArrows":false,"slideDots":false,"slidesToShow":1,"slidesToScroll":1,"autoplay":false,"autoplaySpeed":1000,"visibility":true,"variableWidth":false,"infinite":true,"focusOnSelect":true,"enableProgressBar":false,"fadeIn":false}"><div class="" id="accordion_1e1425f9edc7" data-fadein="" style="display: block;"><div class="card bs-active">  <div class="card-header accordion__block__btn" id="panel_518d88620a64_header" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#panel_518d88620a64" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="panel_518d88620a64"><h3>Live and Historical Racing </h3></div><div id="panel_518d88620a64" class="card-panel collapse show" aria-labelledby="panel_518d88620a64_header" data-parent="#accordion_1e1425f9edc7"><div class="card-body"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__floating-panel show" data-parent="#panel_518d88620a64"><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default enable">    <div class="bs-common-image">
                            <figure class="figure justify-content-start d-flex">
                            <picture>
                            
                            <img src="https://www.churchilldownsincorporated.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Live-and-Historical-Racing.webp" class="img-fluid" alt="" title="">
                            </picture>
                                
                            </figure>
                        </div></div>
<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h4 class="wp-block-heading">Company Segments</h4>



<h5 class="wp-block-heading">Live and Historical Racing</h5>



<p>The Live and Historical Racing segment includes pari-mutuel racing entertainment venues. Kentucky properties include the legendary Churchill Downs Racetrack, home of the Kentucky Derby which conducts live Thoroughbred racing during Spring, September and Fall Meets. Derby City Gaming & Hotel and Derby City Gaming Downtown are historical racing machine (“HRM”) entertainment venues that operate under the Churchill Downs pari-mutuel racing license in Louisville. Oak Grove Racing, Gaming & Hotel offers live harness racing and HRMs in Oak Grove. Turfway Park Racing & Gaming is a live winter Thoroughbred racetrack and HRM entertainment venue in Florence with ancillary HRM facility Newport Racing & Gaming in Newport. Ellis Park Racing & Gaming is a live summer Thoroughbred racetrack and HRM venue in Henderson with ancillary HRM facility Owensboro Racing & Gaming in Owensboro. In Virginia, the segment includes Colonial Downs Racetrack in New Kent, as well as eight HRM facilities that include Rosie’s Gaming Emporium venues located in Collinsville, Dumfries, Emporia, Hampton, New Kent, Richmond and Vinton and The Rose Gaming Resort also in Dumfries.</p>
</div></div>
</div></div></div><div class="card">  <div class="card-header accordion__block__btn" id="panel_ebe04a344c1d_header" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#panel_ebe04a344c1d" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="panel_ebe04a344c1d"><h3>Wagering Services and Solutions</h3></div><div id="panel_ebe04a344c1d" class="card-panel collapse " aria-labelledby="panel_ebe04a344c1d_header" data-parent="#accordion_1e1425f9edc7"><div class="card-body"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__floating-panel" data-parent="#panel_ebe04a344c1d"><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default enable">    <div class="bs-common-image">
                            <figure class="figure justify-content-start d-flex">
                            <picture>
                            
                            <img src="https://www.churchilldownsincorporated.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/TwinSpires24_SeptemberDerbyProgram_FullPageAd_Color-scaled-e1736196529869.jpg" class="img-fluid" alt="" title="">
                            </picture>
                                
                            </figure>
                        </div></div>
<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h4 class="wp-block-heading">Company Segments</h4>



<h5 class="wp-block-heading">Wagering Services and Solutions</h5>



<p>The Wagering Services and Solutions segment is comprised of online horse race wagering platform, TwinSpires, advanced deposit wagering (“ADW”) business, United Tote and historical horse racing technology leader, Exacta. </p>
</div></div>
</div></div></div><div class="card">  <div class="card-header accordion__block__btn" id="panel_da8f6ef081d6_header" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#panel_da8f6ef081d6" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="panel_da8f6ef081d6"><h3>Gaming</h3></div><div id="panel_da8f6ef081d6" class="card-panel collapse " aria-labelledby="panel_da8f6ef081d6_header" data-parent="#accordion_1e1425f9edc7"><div class="card-body"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__floating-panel" data-parent="#panel_da8f6ef081d6"><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default enable">    <div class="bs-common-image">
                            <figure class="figure justify-content-start d-flex">
                            <picture>
                            
                            <img src="https://www.churchilldownsincorporated.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/DCG-Hotel-May-31-20234980a-e1736195861148.jpg" class="img-fluid" alt="" title="">
                            </picture>
                                
                            </figure>
                        </div></div>
<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h4 class="wp-block-heading">Company Segments</h4>



<h5 class="wp-block-heading">Gaming</h5>



<p>The Gaming segment includes Churchill Downs Incorporated’s casino properties and associated racetrack or jai alai facilities that support the casino license. CDI’s regional gaming portfolio consists of 12 properties located in 11 states including: Calder Casino in Miami Gardens, Florida; del Lago Resort & Casino in Waterloo, New York; Fair Grounds Race Course in New Orleans, Louisiana; Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Sioux City, Iowa; Harlow’s Casino Resort & Spa in Greenville, Mississippi; Miami Valley Gaming in Lebanon, Ohio; Ocean Downs Casino in Berlin, Maryland; Oxford Casino Hotel in Oxford, Maine; Presque Isle Downs & Casino in Erie, Pennsylvania; Rivers Casino in Des Plaines, Illinois; Riverwalk Casino Hotel in Vicksburg, Mississippi; Terre Haute Casino Resort in Terre Haute, Indiana.</p>
</div></div>
</div></div></div><div class="card">  <div class="card-header accordion__block__btn" id="panel_a7af64e054c0_header" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#panel_a7af64e054c0" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="panel_a7af64e054c0"><h3>Coming Soon</h3></div><div id="panel_a7af64e054c0" class="card-panel collapse " aria-labelledby="panel_a7af64e054c0_header" data-parent="#accordion_1e1425f9edc7"><div class="card-body"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__floating-panel" data-parent="#panel_a7af64e054c0"><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default enable">    <div class="bs-common-image">
                            <figure class="figure justify-content-start d-flex">
                            <picture>
                            
                            <img src="https://www.churchilldownsincorporated.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/marshall-2.jpg" class="img-fluid" alt="" title="">
                            </picture>
                                
                            </figure>
                        </div></div>
<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h4 class="wp-block-heading">Company Segments</h4>



<h5 class="wp-block-heading">Coming Soon</h5>



<p><strong>Marshall Yards Racing & Gaming</strong> is CDI’s eighth historical horse racing entertainment venue in Kentucky, is expected to open in early 2026 and will be located on an approximately 4.5-acre site at the intersection of I-69 and I-24 in the Calvert City area. Marshall Yards will feature up to 240 state-of-the-art historical racing machines (“HRMs”), a sports bar and a retail sportsbook, simulcast wagering and food and beverage offerings. The projected investment for the development is $40 to $50 million and it will operate as an annex of Oak Grove Racing, Gaming & Hotel. </p>



<p><strong>Roseshire</strong> is a high-end gaming boutique located in Henrico County, Virginia, that promises a sophisticated experience with a blend of luxury and gaming entertainment. Expected to open in the fourth quarter of 2025, Roseshire will feature 175 state-of-the-art historical racing machines (“HRMs”) and other guest amenities.</p>
</div></div>
</div></div></div></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__floating-panel-container"></div><div id="accordion_1e1425f9edc7_navigation_container" class="bs-slider-accordion__navigation-panel-container" style="display: block;"><div class="bs-slider-accordion__navigation-panel"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__navigation-panel"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__navigation-panel"></div><div class="bs-slider-accordion__navigation-panel"></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></section>

















<section class="bs-section bs-section-0fddf6b6c2608f12fe7103f53be26e228d2ee30c bs-section---default bs-section--slider-common bs-section--gradient-section  "><div class="container">
<div class="bs-row row   bs-row---default">
<div class=" bs-column  col-lg-12 col-xl-4 col-sm-0   bs-column-4c81a9630a2c20b27fbf7f66fba8d89bc8705d3c bs-column---default     ">
<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Our Properties</h2>



<p>Churchill Downs Incorporated proudly oversees 29 industry-leading regional casinos and HRM/racing properties across 14 states.</p>

<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h6 class="wp-block-heading">FALL 2024 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Cultivating Curiosity</strong><div><em>The Kentucky Derby Museum Begins Meaningful Partnership With Churchill Downs to Bring Equine Education to Students</em></div></h3>



<p>The Kentucky Derby Museum and Churchill Downs have been great neighbors and worked together on several projects over the last 40 years to share the joy of the Kentucky Derby with guests from all over the world. With their shared love of education, they have recently launched a meaningful partnership that will impact thousands of Kentucky children over the next three years. The partnership will help cover the cost of the outreach programs and field trips as well as spreading the mission of the Museum well beyond Jefferson County. “We love that it’s Derby every day at the museum. So, we do everything we can to make field trips, outreach and educational programming more accessible to students of all ages and in all corners of Kentucky. We’re proud to partner with Churchill Downs to further these educational programs that our educators are so passionate about,” says Patrick Armstrong, KDM President & CEO. </p>



<div class="bs-div bs-div-d11e78e802a8f8d7e1917263e4b05df7e434a28b bs-div---default bs-div--icon-container"><div class="bs-div__inner     "><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default enable">    <div class="bs-common-image">

                        </div></div>

<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h6 class="wp-block-heading">FALL 2024 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Pasion Por el Futbol</strong><div><em>Churchill Downs Hosts Backstretch Recreation Men’s and Women’s Soccer Tournament, Wildly Popular Amongst the Backside Community</em></div></h3>



<p>The backside of Churchill Downs Racetrack is more than just a stable area, it’s a community. Coming from regions all over the world, hotwalkers, grooms, exercise riders, trainers and their assistants care for the racehorses daily. For them, horse racing is more than just a sport, it’s a way of life. </p>



<p>During the early morning hours, it’s all about the horses and getting them race-ready, caring for them like their own children. But as the sun sends its final rays soaring over the first turn, many join together for another passion they share—soccer. It is a way for them to make friends, build community and provide an outlet to take care of their mental and physical health.</p>

<p>Fall 2024</p>
</div></div>

<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h6 class="wp-block-heading">FALL 2024 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>A GRANDstand Transformation</strong><div><em>Churchill Downs’ Newest Renovation Project Will Continue to Honor Tradition While Elevating Experience</em><span style="outline: 0px !important;"></span></div></h3>



<p>In the coming months, the existing grandstand at Churchill Downs will undergo a comprehensive metamorphosis featuring the construction of the Starting Gate Club and Pavilion—a space poised to capture the essence of this beloved venue. This renovation reflects a delicate balance between respect for the grandstand’s storied past and a forward-thinking vision that embraces modernity and innovation.</p>

<h6 class="wp-block-heading">FALL 2024 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Read Me a Story<br></strong><em>Nonprofit I Would Rather Be Reading Partners With Churchill Downs to Bring Children to the Backside to Read to Horses</em></h3>



<p>“They do get a sparkle in their eye. Most of the kids really enjoy it and they leave in a better place than when they came in.” </p>



<p>Churchill Downs horse trainer Michelle Lovell knows a thing or two about the four-legged “kids” she trains daily to win on the track. In fact, it’s hard to know whether the sparkle she’s talking about is in the eyes of the visiting children or the horses. Actually, it’s probably both. </p>



<p>Her horses are the beneficiaries of a unique partnership between the Louisville, Kentucky-based nonprofit, I Would Rather Be Reading and Churchill Downs Racetrack. </p>

<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Quintessential Kentucky Derby</strong> <strong>Style</strong><br><em>2024 Official Kentucky Derby Style Guide</em></h3>



<p>This year’s Kentucky Derby brings heightened reverence for the annual festivities and attention to wardrobe detail is no exception. After all, the Run for the Roses does have a 150-year history for becoming the world’s most prestigious outdoor runway. To provide an atlas of attire for racing fans, the Churchill Downs team, along with Guest Editor Zanna Roberts Rassi, worked with treasured partners and official licensees as well as top designers from around the globe to curate the first ever official Style Guide for the 2024 Kentucky Derby. Mixing classic race day occasion wear with contemporary design, the guide honors decades of fashion inspiration by presenting a composite of heirloom elegance alongside today’s biggest trends.</p>

<h4 class="wp-block-heading"><strong><em>Wylie Caudill Brings His Signature Roses to the Official Art of the 150th Run for the Roses</em></strong></h4>



<p><em>Wylie Caudill’s journey into the world of art is a testament to the power of passion, perseverance and the powerfully transformative influence of social media. Initially harnessing his budding creativity as a chalk artist on the campus of Eastern Kentucky University (EKU), Wylie’s aim was to connect with people and establish a reputation for himself as he tried to find his place in this new phase of undergraduate life. Even with his vast imagination, he never envisioned this seemingly small and concentrated endeavor would ignite a deep love for large-scale artwork and pave the way for a successful career as a muralist.</em></p>

<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The Sun Shines Bright: Aimee Griffith and the Official Art of the Kentucky Derby </h3>



<p><em>“The artist chosen for the official artwork of the Kentucky Derby always has a unique story, but Aimee Griffith’s journey as an artist is especially intriguing. Born and raised in Bardstown, Kentucky, with fond memories of Thunder Over Louisville as a kid, Aimee didn’t truly begin her work as an artist until recent years. Though she took an art class in college, it wasn’t until her family’s relocatoin to Austrailia in 2016 that Aimee really began to come into her own as an artist. What began as trips to the free museums with her kids eventually led to her own urge to pick up a paint brush herself.” </em></p>

<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The Father of the Kentucky Derby: How Col. Matt Winn Established the Legacy of the Kentucky Derby</h3>



<p><em>“It is nearly impossible to speak of the Kentucky Derby without mentioning the name of Matt Winn. <div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h6 class="wp-block-heading">SPRING 2021 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Overcoming Erasure: <br> Kentucky Derby Museum expands and enhances its ‘Black Heritage in Racing’ exhibition</h3>



<p><em>“As with much of American history, the contributions of Black horsemen to the legacy of the Kentucky Derby, though integral, are largely unknown to far too many of us. This spring, the Kentucky Derby Museum is doubling down on its efforts to remedy that erasure. Since 1993, the museum has hosted a permanent ‘Black Heritage in Racing’ exhibit on the second floor. But now, the exhibit moves downstairs to a 930-square-foot space to expand the stories of legendary Black horsemen through artifacts, oral history interviews and artwork.”</em></p>



<div class="bs-div bs-div-d11e78e802a8f8d7e1917263e4b05df7e434a28b bs-div---default bs-div--icon-container"><div class="bs-div__inner     "><div class="media-elements bs-media-element---default enable">    <div class="bs-common-image">

<p>Spring 2021</p>

<div class="bs-div bs-div-acbf304e3f022e80caaf6e3e90b894881cf39843 bs-div---default"><div class="bs-div__inner     ">
<h6 class="wp-block-heading">2020 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Racing’s Keystone: <br><em>A celebration of the 125th anniversary of the Twin Spires</em></h3>



<p><em>“Every object and significant building of the first 20 years of the Downs and the Derby – with the exception of the racetrack itself, which hasn’t moved an inch in 146 years – have been modified or removed. One has to say the ‘modern’ life of the ancient Downs begins with that grandstand and its spires: the heart of the track that grew from there and a continuing heartbeat of its history.”</em></p>

<h6 class="wp-block-heading">FALL 2019 ISSUE</h6>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Greatness in Motion: <br><em>Country House’s Derby 145 triumph</em></h3>



<p><em>“It almost never is, but sometimes the exception confirms the rule: 2019 Kentucky Derby victor Country House looks like a horse that was born to win. With his fluid and sturdy movement, watching him run is a joy, all long strides and lean muscle. A glossy copper chestnut with a shock of white blazing down his forehead, this is what you picture when you close your eyes and envision ‘champion.’”</em></p>

 }    }  
  if(screen_height == ""){
 if(screen){
   screen_height=screen.height;  
 }else{
     screen_height=jQuery(window).height();
 }    }
form.append('<input type="hidden" name="vx_width" value="'+screen_width+'">');
form.append('<input type="hidden" name="vx_height" value="'+screen_height+'">');
form.append('<input type="hidden" name="vx_url" value="'+window.location.href+'">');  
}); 

});
</script>
